Either connect randomly the positions considering the max curve count
or sequentially connect them based on position order
First we create straight strands
Create new positions in the straight line before we curve it
Get the staright strand directions and construct points with this orientation to project the curve later on
init position sample position ratio and create a simple curve based on -1 to 1 -- x2.

Implementation of: A Convenient Generalization of Schlick’s Bias and Gain Functions

Paper by Jonathan T.Barron

PDF: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2010.09714.pdf
Construct our strands with the orientation

create a simple random sin animation based on how droopy the strand is
rotate the point along the Y axis - then we translate the point down another axis
Porject the point down the Z-axis to create our curve
Create the orientations on the points based on the position we projected from and the direction to the next point`
